scripts.analytics:full: npm run build && npm run analytics:report && node scripts/notifyDigest.mjs && echo 'reports:' && ls -la reports || true
scripts.analytics:full:open: npm run analytics:full && open reports/digest.txt || true
scripts.validate:qbank: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const allowed=new Set(['withdraw_and_protect','push_through','follow_momentum','observe_and_wait','seek_support','adjust_strategy','avoid_conflict','self_prioritize']);let data;try{data=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('src/core/ontology/questionBank.v1.json','utf8'));}catch(err){console.error('parse error:',err.message);process.exit(1);}let ok=true;const fail=msg=>{console.error(msg);ok=false;};(data.items||[]).forEach((item,ti)=>{(item.questions||[]).forEach((q,qi)=>{const choiceSet=new Set(q.choices||[]);(q.choice_meta||[]).forEach((m,mi)=>{const theme=item.theme_id||'unknown';const choice=(m.choice||'').trim();if(!allowed.has(m.behavior_facet)) fail('invalid facet '+m.behavior_facet+' at '+theme+' q'+qi+' c'+mi);if(!choiceSet.has(choice)) fail('choice mismatch at '+theme+' q'+qi+' c'+mi);});});});if(!ok)process.exit(1);console.log('questionBank.v1.json OK');"
scripts.validate:legacy: npm run validate:round2 && npm run validate:questionbank && npm run validate:narrative
scripts.verify:all: npm run verify:domain && npm run verify:round2:schema && npm run verify:r3:gate && npm run verify:round4:coverage && npm run verify:legacy:imports && npm run verify:entry:nolegacy && npm run verify:ui:nolegacy && npm run smoke:ui:governance && npm run verify:bundles:nolegacy && npm run verify:strings:nolegacy && npm run verify:round2:ui:ontology
scripts.validate:all: npm run validate:governance && npm run validate:semantic
